<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[You're Next](/Feats.aspx?ID=4922) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 165 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=258) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Trigger**
You reduce an enemy to 0 Hit Points

</column>

---

After downing a foe, you menace another. Attempt to Demoralize a creature within 60 feet, with a +2 circumstance bonus. If you have legendary proficiency in Intimidation, you can use this as a free action with the same trigger.
name: You're Next
